SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_cps_user (id, time, user_id, spreader_id, total_invest, total_rebate, recivable_rebate, total_additional) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{spreaderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{totalInvest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalRebate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{recivableRebate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalAdditional,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update: update t_cps_user set time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, spreader_id = #{spreaderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, total_invest = #{totalInvest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_rebate = #{totalRebate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, recivable_rebate = #{recivableRebate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_additional = #{totalAdditional,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, time, user_id, spreader_id, total_invest, total_rebate, recivable_rebate, total_additional from t_cps_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
